.Valid Usage (Implicit)
****
* [[VUID-VkImageViewUsageCreateInfo-sType-sType]] pname:sType must: be ename:VK_STRUCTURE_TYPE_IMAGE_VIEW_USAGE_CREATE_INFO
* [[VUID-VkImageViewUsageCreateInfo-usage-parameter]] pname:usage must: be a valid combination of elink:VkImageUsageFlagBits values
* [[VUID-VkImageViewUsageCreateInfo-usage-requiredbitmask]] pname:usage must: not be `0`
****
